titles.title: Providing amounts from the contingent fund of the House for expenses of investigations and studies by the Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs in the second session of the One Hundred Third Congress.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Accounts.

bill.summary: 2/1/1994--Introduced. Provides amounts for expenses of investigations and studies by the House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs in the second session of the 103d Congress.
